New World MasterChef promo: Man fails in his bid for refund after missing out on cookware https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/new-world-masterchef-promo-man-fails-in-his-bid-for-refund-after-missing-out-on-cookware/7XVF5FVJHBDDPGJNIRQ3E3DP7Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/new-world-masterchef-promo-man-fails-in-his-bid-for-refund-after-missing-out-on-cookware/7XVF5FVJHBDDPGJNIRQ3E3DP7Q/ Jeremy WilkinsonThe supermarket chain ran out of free cookware, sparking outrage last year. Former Auckland teacher Murray Sakey sentenced over child sex images he claims provided inspiration for writing https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/former-auckland-teacher-murray-sakey-sentenced-over-child-sex-images-he-claims-provided-inspiration-for-writing/XRQIY5ARGJDTFIDVPVPMRTWFDU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/former-auckland-teacher-murray-sakey-sentenced-over-child-sex-images-he-claims-provided-inspiration-for-writing/XRQIY5ARGJDTFIDVPVPMRTWFDU/ Katie HarrisPolice found hundreds of objectionable photos and videos on his devices. Sun, 02 Jun 2024 00:30:03 +0000 Auckland man Murray Sakey, 74, pleaded guilty to having hundreds of child exploitation images. Sakey was sentenced on May 24, 2024, in the Waitakere District Court. Photo / Katie Harris

Auckland caregiver Kilikilitefua’i’afitu Fualalo twisted religion to prey on vulnerable child https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/auckland-caregiver-kilikilitefuaiafitu-fualalo-twisted-religion-to-prey-on-vulnerable-child/ARJ5HEU4HJBARPHD7FFWECLJFA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/auckland-caregiver-kilikilitefuaiafitu-fualalo-twisted-religion-to-prey-on-vulnerable-child/ARJ5HEU4HJBARPHD7FFWECLJFA/ Craig KapitanHe was charged in 2022 with exploiting his positon of trust over 15 years earlier. Sun, 02 Jun 2024 00:00:00 +0000 Auckland resident Kilikilitefua'i'afitu Fualalo has been sentenced to prison for sexually abusing a vulnerable at-risk teen who was in his care in the mid-2000s.
